title: Perfect live-work space, large & sunny arts & crafts-style 2 BDRMs
posting_body: Perfect live-work space in roomy, sunny arts & crafts-style 2 BDRMs unit in classic Portage Park 2-flat on quiet residential street close to everything!
Beautiful hardwood floors and vintage features throughout.
Lots of closet space, new in-unit laundry, sep LR, DR with bonus room for small office or more closet/storage.
Walk to Portage Park, Six Corners shopping & dining.
Minutes to nearby Expressway, METRA & CTA.
Sec. deposit, excellent credit, preferably FICO® Scores 660s (min.), rental history, sufficient income-to-rent ratio, background check.
